Ethereal Bloom
[ release ]

Ethereal Bloom is a series highlighting ambient and experimental music. The shows feel like a cozy living room. Ceremonial cacao will be served by @go.ta.go.ta.go . Yoga mats and pillows are provided. Movement is welcome, and so is lying on the floor. Drawing materials, poetry books, and hand fidgets will be provided. This is a space that welcomes folks who may feel overstimulated at typical gigs! Swipe to see photos from previous Bloom.
